successes.title: HidrateMe Smart Water Bottle
successes.description: HidrateMe, a connected water bottle that tracks your water intake and glows to make sure that you never forget to drink your water again.

Pledges.description:
DIGITAL THANK YOU
For being awesome you will receive a special Thank You video from the Hidrate team. *applies to anyone pledging $5 or more!

SHIRT
Exclusive only for Kickstarter! You can show your support in style with a t shirt designed with a favorite travel picture taken by the Hidrate team. American Apparel S M L XL

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - HidrateMe BOTTLE
One HidrateMe bottle in the color of your choice.

HidrateMe BOTTLE
One HidrateMe bottle in the color of your choice.

HidrateMe BOTTLE AND SHIRT
One HidrateMe bottle in the color of your choice  and our stylish Hidrate shirt.

HidrateMe BOTTLE AND SHIRT
One HidrateMe bottle in the color of your choice  and our stylish Hidrate shirt.

2 HidrateMe BOTTLES 
Two HidrateMe bottles in the colors of your choice. Great for you and a friend!

3 HidrateMe BOTTLES 
Three HidrateMe bottles in the colors of your choice.

5 HidrateMe BOTTLES 
Party pack! Five HidrateMe bottles in the colors of your choice. Great for you and your friends.

10 HidrateMe BOTTLES 
Team pack! Ten Hidrate Me bottles in the colors of your choice. Great for you and your team.

3D PRINTED PROTOTYPE BOTTLE SIGNED BY FOUNDERS
Receive an early 3D printed iteration prototype signed by the Hidrate founders. Also receive two personally engraved HidrateMe bottles in the colors of your choice and two shirts.

DINNER WITH THE TEAM & NAME NEXT COLOR
Join the Hidrate team for a lovely dinner and lively conversation. We're pretty fun! Help us pick and name the next color for the HidrateMe bottles. Also receive two personally engraved HidrateMe bottles in the colors of your choice and two shirts.  *Airfare not included *Location TBD

DEEP SEA FISHING WITH THE TEAM
The Hidrate Team will take you out for a deep sea fishing trip in the gulf coast of Florida. Also receive two personally engraved HidrateMe bottles in the colors of your choice and a shirt. *Airfare not included
